SourceProxy.name: TableReader
SourceProxy.label: Database Table Reader

Documentation.long_help: Create a vtkTable from a database table.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The Table reader creates a vtkTable from a database table. The database can either be specified locally as a .db file, or as a remote URI.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the Table reader.
